# Administration and Diagnostics

> Documentation for Administration and Diagnostics.

- [Configuring Message Logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/configuring-message-logging.md): Learn how to configure message logging, including how to enable logging, logging levels, message filters, and how to configure a custom listener in WCF.
- [Configuring Your Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/configuring-your-application.md): Learn more about: Configuring Your Application
- [Deploying Services](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/deploying-services.md): Learn more about: Deploying Services
- [Administration and Diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/index.md): Learn more about: Administration and Diagnostics
- [Message Flow Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/message-flow-overview.md): Learn more about: Message Flow Overview
- [Message Logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/message-logging.md): Learn more about: Message Logging
- [Security Concerns for Message Logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/security-concerns-for-message-logging.md): Learn more about: Security Concerns for Message Logging
- [ServiceModel Registration Tool](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/servicemodel-registration-tool.md): Learn more about: ServiceModel Registration Tool
- [Viewing Message Logs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/viewing-message-logs.md): Learn more about: Viewing Message Logs

## Subtopics

- [Analytic Tracing with ETW](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/etw/llms.txt): 358 topics; Analytic Tracing with ETW documentation and reference.
- [Event Logging in WCF](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/event-logging/llms.txt): 79 topics; Event Logging in WCF documentation and reference.
- [Exceptions Reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/exceptions-reference/llms.txt): 25 topics; Exceptions Reference documentation and reference.
- [WCF Performance Counters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/llms.txt): 71 topics; WCF Performance Counters documentation and reference.
- [Tracing Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/tracing/llms.txt): 423 topics; Tracing Docs documentation and reference.
- [Using Windows Management Instrumentation for Diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/wmi/llms.txt): 77 topics; Using Windows Management Instrumentation for Diagnostics documentation and reference.
